articles.title: Perseus Mining Refinances and Upsizes Debt Facility to US$400M
articles.mainIdea: Perseus Mining Refinances and Upsizes Debt Facility to US$400M
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Perseus Mining Refinances and Upsizes Debt Facility to US$400M. Perth, Dec. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PERSEUS REFINANCES AND UPSIZES DEBT FACILITY TO US $400 MILLION HIGHLIGHTS Perseus has signed a US$400 million syndicated revolving corporate facility replacing the existing US$300 million facility 1Based on its Sept 30, 2025 Net Cash Position of US$8372,1 million, the amended refinance facility provides Perseus with more than US$1,237 million of available liquidity with a three-year tenure plus an option to extend for a further two years (1+1)3Perseus we Related tickers mentioned: PMNXF.

articles.title: Is Prudential Financial Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Rebound in 2025?
articles.mainIdea: Is Prudential Financial Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Rebound in 2025?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is Prudential Financial Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Rebound in 2025?. Wondering if Prudential Financial at around $114.99 is a bargain or already priced for perfection? You are not alone. This stock often attracts value minded investors trying to decide if now is the moment to step in or top up. Despite a modest 2.0% gain over the last year, the stock has climbed 7.7% in the past month even after a 2.2% dip this week, and it remains up 34.1% over three years and 90.3% over five years. This suggests the market has steadily warmed to its story while still...

articles.title: Foldable phone makers have solved every issue except one
articles.mainIdea: Foldable phone makers have solved every issue except one
articles.summary: Engadget: Foldable phone makers have solved every issue except one. In 2025, the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold proved that manufacturers have solved all the major issues with foldable phones except one last thing.
